message: I'm at a technology services company. We're at the point where we'd like to transition from client services to a company that sells software. Are the examples of startups that have successfully done this?
you are not going to like it: http://www.bothsidesofthetable.com/2011/04/25/what-should-you-do-with-your-crappy-little-services-business/  but it is dead on (3rd segment or so)
Experts-Exchange & Wikipedia/Mediawiki. They didn't actually pivot though.
